mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (msg_no, sendid, receiveid, title, content, msg_date, read_ck, visible_recv, visible_send) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(msg_no), 0)+1 as msg_no FROM message), #{sendid}, #{receiveid}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 'N', 'Y', 'Y')
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM message
WHERE receiveid=#{userid} and visible_recv = 'Y'
WHERE sendid=#{userid} and visible_send = 'Y'
AND title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
AND content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
AND category LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
AND (title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%')
